mapper.insert: insert into member(reg_date , name, password, birth, email, gender, phone_num, admin) values( now(), aes_encrypt(#{name },SHA2('shopmall',512)), SHA2(#{password },512), #{birth }, aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512)), 'M', aes_encrypt(#{phone_num },SHA2('shopmall',512)), 0);
mapper.select: select * from member where email=aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512)) and password=SHA2(#{password },512);
mapper.delete: delete from member where email=aes_encrypt(#{email },SHA2('shopmall',512)) and password=SHA2(#{password },512);
